trans-unit.source: Represents a WQL *REFERENCES OF* data query.
trans-unit.target: 表示 WQL REFERENCES OF 数据查询。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.RelationshipQuery" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.RelationshipQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.RelationshipQuery" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.RelationshipQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The query string or the class name for this query.
trans-unit.target: 查询字符串或此查询的类名。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.RelationshipQuery" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.RelationshipQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If the specified string can be successfully parsed as a WQL query, it is considered to be the query string; otherwise, it is assumed to be the path of the source object for the query.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以将指定的字符串成功地分析为 WQL 查询，则认为该字符串是查询字符串；否则，将假定它是查询的源对象的路径。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the query is assumed to be an instances query.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，假定该查询为实例查询。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the type of relationship between a WMI class and a <xref:System.Management.RelatedObjectQuery>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置 WMI 类之间的关系类型和<xref:System.Management.RelatedObjectQuery>。

trans-unit.source: The path of the source object for this query.
trans-unit.target: 该查询的源对象的路径。

trans-unit.source: The type of relationship for which to query.
trans-unit.target: 要查询的关系的类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.RelationshipQuery" /> class for the given source object and relationship class.
trans-unit.target: 根据给定的源对象和关系类初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.RelationshipQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The query is assumed to be an instance query (as opposed to a schema query).
trans-unit.target: 假定查询为实例查询（相对于架构查询）。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that this is a schema query; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指示这是架构查询，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The path of the source class for this query.
trans-unit.target: 此查询的源类的路径。

trans-unit.source: The type of relationship for which to query.
trans-unit.target: 要查询的关系的类型。

trans-unit.source: A qualifier required to be present on the relationship class.
trans-unit.target: 需要在关系类中存在的限定符。

trans-unit.source: The role that the source class is required to play in the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 源类需要在关系中扮演的角色。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.RelationshipQuery" /> class for a schema query using the given set of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的参数集，为架构查询初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.RelationshipQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used for schema queries only, so the first parameter must be true.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数仅用于架构查询，因此第一个参数必须为 true。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The path of the source object for this query.
trans-unit.target: 该查询的源对象的路径。

trans-unit.source: The type of relationship for which to query.
trans-unit.target: 要查询的关系的类型。

trans-unit.source: A qualifier required to be present on the relationship object.
trans-unit.target: 需要在关系对象中存在的限定符。

trans-unit.source: The role that the source object is required to play in the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 源对象需要在关系中扮演的角色。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, it contains a Boolean that indicates that only class definitions for the resulting objects are returned.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回时，它包含一个布尔值，该值指示只返回结果对象的类定义。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.RelationshipQuery" /> class for the given set of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 按照给定的参数集初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.RelationshipQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The query is assumed to be an instance query (as opposed to a schema query).
trans-unit.target: 假定查询为实例查询（相对于架构查询）。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Builds the query string according to the current property values.
trans-unit.target: 根据当前属性值生成查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating that only the class definitions of the relevant relationship objects be returned.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示只返回相关关系对象的类定义。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value indicating that only the class definitions of the relevant relationship objects be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值指示只返回相关关系对象的类定义。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the query string is rebuilt to reflect the new flag.
trans-unit.target: 作为其副作用是，查询字符串重新生成，以反映新的标志。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 属性值

trans-unit.source: `true` if the query requests only class definitions of the result set; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: `true` 如果查询请求的结果集中; 只能使用类定义，否则为`false`。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the object.
trans-unit.target: 创建对象的一个副本。

trans-unit.source: The copied object.
trans-unit.target: 所复制的对象。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this query is a schema query or an instance query.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此查询是架构查询还是实例查询。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value indicating whether this query is a schema query.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值指示此查询是否为架构查询。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new query type.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的查询类型。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 属性值

trans-unit.source: `true` if this query should be evaluated over the schema; `false` if the query should be evaluated over instances.
trans-unit.target: `true` 如果此查询应求得架构;`false`如果查询应求得实例。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The query string to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 要分析的查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: Parses the query string and sets the property values accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 分析查询字符串并相应地设置属性值。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the class of the relationship objects wanted in the query.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置查询中所需的关系对象的类。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value containing the relationship class name.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，该值包含关系类名。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new class.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的类。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 属性值

trans-unit.source: A string containing the relationship class name.
trans-unit.target: 包含关系类名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a qualifier required on the relationship objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关系对象上所需的限定符。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value containing the name of the qualifier required on the relationship objects.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，该值包含关系对象所需的限定符的名称。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new qualifier.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的限定符。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 属性值

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the qualifier required on the relationship objects.
trans-unit.target: 包含所需的关系对象的限定符的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source object for this query.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此查询的源对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value containing the path of the object to be used for the query.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，该值包含要用于查询的对象的路径。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new source object.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的源对象。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 属性值

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path of the object to be used for the query.
trans-unit.target: 表示要用于此查询的对象的路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the role of the source object in the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置源对象在关系中扮演的角色。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value containing the role of this object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，该值包含此对象的角色。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new role.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的角色。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 属性值

trans-unit.source: A string containing the role of this object.
trans-unit.target: 包含此对象的角色的字符串。
